sen.j: 川田神社（かわたじんじゃ）は、滋賀県湖南市甲西町に鎮座する神社である。
sen.e: Kawata-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists Kosei-cho, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture.
Kawata-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kosei-cho, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: that existsをlocated inに変更しました。
sen.e: Kawata-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kosei-cho, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture.
It is a shikinai-sha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) ronja (shrines considered to be descendants of a shikinai-sha).
It is a Shikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).
sen.cmt: 括弧の説明を1つにまとめました。
sen.e: It is a Shikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).
The first enshrinement date is unknown.
The first enshrinement date is unknown.
The first enshrinement date is unknown.

sen.j: 延喜式神名帳に記載の名神大社の論社である。
sen.e: It is an Engishiki Myojin-taisha Shrine ronja (shrines considered to be descendants of a shikinai-sha) listed in Jinmyocho (the list of deities) of Engishiki (codes and procedures on national rites and prayers).
It is a shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines registered in the list of deities under Engishiki laws.
It is a shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines registered in the list of deities under Engishiki laws.

sen.cmt: 大文字に変更しました。
大文字に変更し、数字を修正しました。
